definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe/also written 哈密瓜
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

sentences.english: We had melon for lunch at school.
sentences.chinese: 在學校喫午飯時，我們學校了哈蜜瓜。

sentences.english: Evidently, people who borrow glass houses shouldn't throw cantaloupes.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，借玻璃屋來使用的人，是不該扔哈蜜瓜的。

sentences.english: Beginning in seventeenth Century, Xinjiang as a tribute melon.
sentences.chinese: 17世紀開始，哈蜜瓜列爲新疆貢品。

sentences.english: We get melon to lunch at educate.
sentences.chinese: 在清華喫午飯時，咱們吃了哈蜜瓜。

sentences.english: Cantaloupes are on sale this week.
Hami degree of raw and cooked appearance of the senses from the identification of mainly the following aspects.
sentences.chinese: 哈蜜瓜生熟度從外表上的感官鑑別主要有以下幾方面。

sentences.english: Dig honey dew melon to be balls.
sentences.chinese: 用挖球器將哈蜜瓜挖成球狀，備用。

definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
